This game takes alot of getting used to! The tutorial at this time barely tells you anything! In spite of that when you learn more about the killers and survivors skill sets the game becomes very enjoyable. Also, I've been told this game is extremely fun when you play with friends, I wouldn't know anything about that through :(

For me, this is and has always been my main game.  I'm a big fan of Michael Myers and Laurie Strode in anything Halloween related.  Unfortunately, the game doesn't have a huge fanbase for those characters and running against a Myers or getting a Laurie in your match are a dime a dozen.  However, I still love playing the game no matter how toxic or frustrating it gets every time.
Never play this game ever please don't do it

Smash Bros for horror fans. Community ranges from the most wholesome people I've met in my life to the most angry, sodium-fueled degenerates you'll ever see. Easy recommend.

Why an M-rated video game has a built-in chat filter is beyond me. I guess the developers think their playerbase is too sensitive and mentally imbalanced to handle words such as t-bag, booty, and worst of all, Twitter. That's right. Social media is also censored in a murder simulation game. Sure, there are balance issues and the game's health isn't great, but the real problem is the censorship. How am I supposed to share my support for big bootys with other players if the game turns those words into ### ######?
its really fun to play with friends and other online players easy way to make friends online with
